data.question: How do you select Regions to support your sustainability goals?
ans: a.Choose Regions near Amazon renewable energy projects and Regions where the grid has a published carbon intensity that is lower than other locations (or Regions).
b.None of these

data.question: How do you take advantage of user behavior patterns to support your sustainability goals?
ans: a.Scale infrastructure with user load
b.Align SLAs with sustainability goals
c.Stop the creation and maintenance of unused assets
d.Optimize geographic placement of workloads for user locations
e.Optimize team member resources for activities performed
f.None of these

data.question: How do you take advantage of software and architecture patterns to support your sustainability goals?
ans: a.Optimize software and architecture for asynchronous and scheduled jobs
b.Remove or refactor workload components with low or no use
c.Optimize areas of code that consume the most time or resources
d.Optimize impact on customer devices and equipment
e.Use software patterns and architectures that best support data access and storage patterns
f.None of these

data.question: How do you take advantage of data access and usage patterns to support your sustainability goals?
ans: a.Implement a data classification policy
b.Use technologies that support data access and storage patterns
c.Use lifecycle policies to delete unnecessary data
d.Minimize over-provisioning in block storage
e.Remove unneeded or redundant data
f.Use shared file systems or object storage to access common data
g.Minimize data movement across networks
h.Back up data only when difficult to recreat
i.None of these

data.question: How do your hardware management and usage practices support your sustainability goals?
ans: a.Use the minimum amount of hardware to meet your needs
b.Use instance types with the least impact
c.Use managed services
d.Optimize your use of GPUs
e.None of these

data.question: How do your development and deployment processes support your sustainability goals?
ans: a.Adopt methods that can rapidly introduce sustainability improvements
b.Keep your workload up to date
c.Increase utilization of build environments
d.Use managed device farms for testing
e.None of these
